name: Vault Demo "3"
description: Finally the demo 3 of Vault arrived with the possibility of being able to play all the game modes we have made so far such as -Posession -Terminator -Capture the Flag Etc. The gameplay has also been balanced by making smarter bots. The parkour system has been improved now having the ability to jump from one wall to another and grab the edges of it. Without more nothing to add here I leave the different links
